website_summaries.verdict: The Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 2030 offers a decent image and a good mix of features at a low price, but is still bettered by rivals.
pros: The Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 2030 offers a lot of features for a comparatively low price
picture quality is acceptable for a budget unit
capable of a fairly high light output without sacrificing color too much
cons: Colors are a little unsaturated and black levels aren't the best at the price
some uniformity issues on white scenes

customer_reviews.title: FATAL ERROR ON START UP. Never even got to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with high hopes. The other reviews were really good. I bought it and put it on a shelf in my closet during our remodel. Once we were done I pulled it out and hooked it up. right away it had an fatal error code. It is completely unusable. I followed the prompt and called for a REFURBISHED replacement, which I have to pay for, Still haven't received the new one. I looked online for a solution to the error and apparently it is very common with this model whether on start up or over time. You are taking a pretty big risk with this model.
customer_reviews.author: jessica montoya

customer_reviews.title: great Projector
customer_reviews.text: I have used this projector for a few years now. I have used it in a clean theater room, and I have used it in a dusty, dirty barn, and I have used it outside. This projector keeps on ticking. Great projector!
customer_reviews.author: Travis R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have this set up in a home theater. Throw distance about 14 feet, diagonal screen size about 130" I can't believe I didn't buy one sooner. Incredibly easy to hook up. I suggest a room that is easily dimmed or darkened though. Only real issue: occasionally when hooking up a new device, you will get a black screen (i once received a high def content error). This was fixed by switching the input selection back and forth once, or by turning off both machines and turning them back on. After that, projector has no problem communicating with that same device.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Epson Home Cinema 2030
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector after reading several reviews. I am very happy with it and do not find the cooling fans to be too loud or distracting. You will need a very dark room in order to enjoy the beauty and clarity of this projector. Also, the easy setup instructions didn't cover how to flip the image for ceiling mounting - turns out it is in the setup menu - just takes a while to find the setting for "ceiling mounted front projection".
customer_reviews.author: Mike Curl aka RedonKiLaus

customer_reviews.title: Good projector with problems after 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this projector for 5 years and it's great! However the OEM bulbs suck, and the auto Iris has stopped working. I would still give it 5 stars and plan on purchasing another Epson.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are accurate- this is a great unit!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for family movies on a big projection screen and I am VERY HAPPY with this. Clear, brilliant colors with no technical issues whatsoever. Focuses sharp and easily, keystone adjustment is easy, very easy to use and functional. Remote is typical Japanese and a bit busy but we got used to it. Built-in sound system only for business and no speaker situation. Certainly get yourself a surround sound system if at home. If you are shopping for a movie projector, you will be very happy with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan W. Ong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality on this machine is outstanding. The sound is decent, but I use a sound bar with this unit. The fan is quiet and the features are great as well. The only complaint I have is the video out are standard and not HD. I knew this before buying the projector, it does not lower my rating of this product. It would be nice to see the option for HD video cable. For most people this would not be an issue since the unit supplies two HDMI ports. I just happen to have an older model xbox 360 that does not have HDMI capability.
customer_reviews.author: JakePember

customer_reviews.title: got it mounted to a quail gear projecoe mount worked nicely. The picture is great
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I it this ordered. Wasn't exactly the one I wanted to get but the budget called for this one but I got thw projector with fast prime shipping. No damage to it . got it mounted to a quail gear projecoe mount worked nicely. The picture is great. Good color reproduction. I built a 109" screen for this little guy . i used carls place silver screen material. The 3d looks good. Had to get used to the active shutter glasses haha im used to passive .
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great Full HD projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing. Very quiet in Natural color mode, very bright in Dynamic mode (don't expect both). Starts up relatively quickly, produces a very sharp 100-inch projection from 12 feet. I only use it with one HDMI connection, multiplexed via a Yamaha RX-V377 receiver. Don't know about durability yet - used it for about a month. Will update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I bought this projector instead of another TV
customer_reviews.text: The image quality of this projector is OUTSTANDING. Colors are so vivid and images so crisp. I have been watching Blu-Ray movies and I have to say, I'm so glad I bought this projector instead of another TV. A truly cinematic experience! Just as good, if not better, than the movie theater. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: primetimeoflife

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this projector on a daily basis as a TV for the past 6 months. The color and speed of the picture are exceptional considering I paid 550. Make sure you keep the filter clean or you will burn out the bulb before it's like expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Orban

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The lens on this isn't the best, its a tad blurry around the edges, but this is far better than any projector i've had, and for the money ($999) I have no complaints. The image is very bright, at 125" on "carls blackout cloth" I can have my lights on and windows open and still make out the image. Of course, with daylight and lighting on, the image is described as "passable". Lights turned down or daylight excluded, wow it is bright!
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitron

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, very lightweight. Excellent 3d. I have this projecting 120" in my newly remodeled basement. Low fan noise when on ECO mode. Some people have complained about the Active Aperture making clicking noises but mine makes no noise at all. I like that the bulbs are not too expensive to replace as well. I wish that the remote was back lit, but I guess that is a pretty minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: It's been great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had the 2030 now for about 6 week, and so far it's been great. The only reason for 4 stars is that, 1- haven't had it long enough to check out everything, and 2 - the fan is a bit noisy. I new about the fan issue up front and figured it wasn't that big an issue. For the most part, once you're into watching a movie, and the volume is cranked, you won't notice it. As far as shift and zoom are concerned, just buy a decent mount, use the calculator on Epson's website and you should be in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Markins

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: Turned this on, saw smoke and then heard POP! WENT OUT! ONLY ABOUT 2-3 HOURS OF USE! I FEEL LIKE I WAS SENT A USED PRODUCT! I WISH I CHECKED IT BEFORE PUTTING IT ON A MOUNT AND MOUNTING TO CEILING!
customer_reviews.author: OFFISMART

customer_reviews.title: It has a great picture and I'm amazed at how bright the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old Sharp 720p projector in our theater room. It has a great picture and I'm amazed at how bright the picture is even with the room fully lit. I would have enjoyed purchasing a higher model of Epson than this one if my funds could have supported it, but I'm blown away by how good this one is!
customer_reviews.author: OC/1251

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for a couple days now and this projector is amazing! We are projecting onto a brown textured wall right now and besides being able to see the texture picture quality is still amazing. We are projecting a 160" display, it's 12'x6'! PROS: picture quality/size, brightness, ease of use, basically everything CONS: fans a little loud, speaker isn't the greatest There are a few things I wish it had which more expensive projectors have but for price this projector can not be beaten, simply amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I've been using it for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I've been using it for a few months already and it's perfect. Also I bought a Bluetooth transmitter/receiver and connected it to the audio out on the projector and now I can pair a Bluetooth speaker to it. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Erick Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Image and Adequate Brightness on 100" Screen in the Basement
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The 2030 projects onto an inexpensive 100" screen in a basement media room with < 1% exterior light. The image is sharp and bright enough. New to me is that turning on the projector also turns on the HDMI linked Blu-Ray player. I imagine it would also turn on the receiver if it was newer.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Working great, love the picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Working great, love the picture quality. Easy to setup. The only negative I noticed was fan sound, which some times bothers. Everything else is super cool. In built sound is definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj

customer_reviews.title: Would be such a great projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector starts out working great! I love it as long as it works . It has ver vivid and clear pictures. I am now on my 4th one ,glad it was a two year warranty on it. My fourth one has also decided to quit on me, and my warranty is about to run out!! Always get the same message; no signal . I have changed out hdmi cords with same result, I so wish this didn't happen, have I just been extremely unlucky ? I don't know, but I'm hoping Epsom has a solution for me, would be nice if it lasted longer 3-4 months..
customer_reviews.author: August Rush

customer_reviews.title: I am an electronic junkie and this projector amazes me ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an electronic junkie and this projector amazes me everyday. I have it shooting on the wall with studio tech 100 vinal latex based paint. I have never seen such a clear picture! And that's on a 200" screen! Will compete with any led/lcd on the market and at that size, at a fraction of the price. Could not be more impressed. An absolute steal!
customer_reviews.author: Benito Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It's a lot of bang for the buck without having to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: across1975

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about the noise
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture but noisy....am using in a 14 * 15 theater room....have to turn up the surround sound to drown out the projector noise BUT the picture is awesome....may never want to go to the theaters again!
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Love this projector
customer_reviews.text: Very clear, even with natural sunlight coming in. Love this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: bowl of rice
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace my 8yr old/26 inch hdtv. now its 100+ inches w/ 3d..! like eating a grain of rice vs a huge bowl of rice. Best purchase of this year! no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: leesolid

customer_reviews.title: Have been running this over a month -- love it
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews of all recently released projectors before pulling the trigger and this one fit the budget and had good reviews from consumer and professional users. I mounted this on my ceiling and so far we have enjoyed the 128" screen for cheaper than a new TV around 80" TV would cost. This projector best fit the budget and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kdubs

customer_reviews.title: 175" star destroyer.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! Installed per epson website, giving us a 175" (diag.) screen. Installation menu was simple and effective. HD clarity and brightness are truly amazing when paired with Paint-on-Screen wall paint. Connected to XBox One for gaming and Blu-Ray movies.
customer_reviews.author: CRT

customer_reviews.title: ... use it for an outdoor projector and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for an outdoor projector and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ Man

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. We feel like we're at the cinema when combined with our sound system. I'm getting a crystal clear picture of 155" with a throw distance of 15 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Potter fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg this product is amazing I am very very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Higher Focus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best thing ever build a screen with the rolled cloth and u have a awesome living room
customer_reviews.author: Bone Bugz in Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this machine. It lives up to it's ad and I love being able to watch 3D on my home theater 120" screen!
customer_reviews.author: SeMurioPeten

customer_reviews.title: works wonders as a basic home theater, I project ...
customer_reviews.text: works wonders as a basic home theater, I project on a white wall - bright and clear image (from 12') and enough controls to adjust most things; only concern is the somewhat slim leg that is used to adjust the height of the projection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! And the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! And the price? I feel like a thief. This product delivered every thing promised, and the 3d is absolutly stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Judge H.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good projector. Projection distance and size are moderate
customer_reviews.text: Good projector.Projection distance and size are moderate.Sound is a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: ritzy1535

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on whether or not to use a projector on my theater room project but am I glad I did! The picture from this projector it AMAZING!!!! I get a 126" picture makes my family feel like we are at the movies.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt G.

customer_reviews.title: awesome projector
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this projector for six months now to watch everything from TV to blue ray movies to playing video games. It works fantastically on them all. I am projecting the image to 146" diagonally and it rivals my neighbors much larger projector. I tried two other projectors and neither had the image quality of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for the price. Only thing I have negative to say is that it puts out a lot of heat, especially for a small room. But for the price compared to other units this was a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hall

customer_reviews.title: I get some fan noise but picture is awesome, and the 3d is great
customer_reviews.text: I get some fan noise but picture is awesome, and the 3d is great. I use Samsung SSG-5150GB 3d active glasses there cheap and work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Epson 2030 Review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far, better than the Optoma HD20 which failed shortly after one year. I like the short throw; bigger picture at a shorter distance. Better picture than being in a theater. The lower power setting works just fine in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Nalley

customer_reviews.title: it is an excellent projector that I bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: it is an excellent projector that I bought from Amazon, with the excellent vision and portable, it really worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Picture, Automatic Iris Makes a bit of Noise
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this projector for over a year in my home theater. My only issue has been with the noise emitted from the automatic iris. I have this mounted on a 7 foot ceiling, about a foot in front of the seating area. During movies you can hear the clicking noise from the iris as it adjusts to the picture. This is a known "issue". Since moving the projector is not an option, I've disabled the automatic iris with negligible impact on the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: CobaltNine

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Awesome projector!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a projected which was in the $1000 range but could work during the day as well as the evening. Doing the day "normal" mode is required and I set the image mode to Living Room. It can be a bit loud but with the sound system on loud, you don't notice the noise of the projector. At night I use "eco" mode. The projector noise is very low and the image is still perfect, especially in cinema mode (best for night). The overall image quality is awesome, especially with FULL HD movies and games! Configuration was very easy too. An awesome projector!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: We love this projector
customer_reviews.text: We love this projector! The color is excellent. we've on;y used it twice and have not watched a 3-D movie yet but will very soon.
customer_reviews.author: William Tingle

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector, Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the buck. Now I have a 200" cinema in my home. The image is very good. The only complaint that I have is that there is not much zoom range, so it must be placed in a limited distance range from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright (even with a lamp on) and very clear (as clear as my 42" led 1080p). Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: david warren

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3d
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the 3d pictures from my 3d DVD player. I felt like I was in the movies. I am well pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: ERVIN MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and it works great. Would recommend it. Have watched movies and hooked it to my sat tv.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turley

customer_reviews.title: High C/P Ratio Home Theatre Projector
customer_reviews.text: Very High capability / price ratio. A very good choice for Rookie home theatre. Bright image, no rainbow effect (in DLP projector). Good performance even viewing enviorment nor completly dark.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great - visible on a white wall, no screen necessary.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent piece of equipment. Make sure one gets Active 3D Glasses - projector cannot do Passive 3D.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF C PRATT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture.
customer_reviews.text: This projector has an incredible picture. I am very happy with the purchase. Very impressed with the brightness of the picture in all light environments.
customer_reviews.author: David park

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: We tried this out with x-box, play station etc and it's great. Absolutely love it. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: viswanath Akella

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product works like a champ in both day time and at night, highly recommended for any use whether its office or home.
customer_reviews.author: Austin L Fruge

customer_reviews.title: Good 1080p for better $$
customer_reviews.text: Projector is perfect to watch HD movies.Did not try 3D feature yet.Tried different picture modes.It is bit noisy when you watch movies at night.
customer_reviews.author: Uk

customer_reviews.title: Good projector! Does what it should!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the results. Just what we wanted from a home theater projection device. Have not used the audio yet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chakravarti

customer_reviews.title: Nice but two problems for me
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and bright. Easy to setup. Lightweight. Very good for small space. Looks reasonably well built. Still, I sent it back for two reasons, which may or may not matter to others: 1) Fan noise was too loud for me. It wasn't bad, but not good either. If I could have placed it out of the way I might have been okay with the extra background noise. 2) The zoom capability was so small (1.2:1) I had to have the projector within 14' of my screen. This limited the placement and how the family gathers around for a movie.
customer_reviews.author: M. McClung

customer_reviews.title: A little bit noisy and auto iris is not perfect. But everything else is 100% as promised
customer_reviews.text: Decent product and totally matches the description. A little bit noisy and auto iris is not perfect. But everything else is 100% as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy!
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud, even in eco mode. The picture is ok, althought I have nothing to compare with. It is so loud that I'm going to dismantle it and try to do something with the fan. I wonder that I have searched the web and have not found anything on fan upgrading issue. I just don't understand how people can withstand with such annoying sound all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Khitaylenko

customer_reviews.title: Not for mounting on a high ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Definitely use the Epson projection calculator before getting one of these. I was mounting on my 9'8" ceiling, and in order to get the image low enough on the wall, I would have had to lower the projector down about 36", which would put it in the way. I am now looking for a projector with vertical lens shift. The fan is also pretty loud. Those were the two main issues I had.
customer_reviews.author: Flatball Matt

customer_reviews.title: STOP LOOKING! YOU JUST FOUND YOUR NEW PROJECTOR!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector shortly after owning the new Benq 1500. I am incredibly impressed with the picture. It is crisp, and honestly it surpasses the Benq in my opinion. With the wireless option of the Benq 1500 you find that there is a constant choppy feeling. It almost feels as if the unit is dropping frames. However with this pictures are smooth, and you get the feeling like you are truly in a cinema. Cons: There is more noise than the previous unit I owned. It never bothers me but you certainly notice it when the projector is the only thing on. Thats it.
customer_reviews.author: acronk

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get up and running. The throw distance is perfect for the room I have it installed in. The HD resolution and 3D capabilities are great. Also good for gaming. I've run Rocksmith and GTA 5 and they look great! Great features for the price. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pt_19

customer_reviews.title: great product go for no qustions ask
customer_reviews.text: great product go for no qustions ask , now i go for the 4k uhd , as soon the come up
customer_reviews.author: Flavio C Florio

customer_reviews.title: Not recommmended
customer_reviews.text: I totally didn't like the quality. Sometimes, while I am watching youtube or making presentation, screen gives errors which is really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks just as good as my sony XBR LED
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Projector !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent Projector. I tried with games, movies and with my HD cable TV. Nice images and very portable. It's a very good deal for a less than 1K projector .....
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Piolli

customer_reviews.title: 还不错
customer_reviews.text: 很不错,图形、色彩、流明都很好,只是噪音还是略高。报关花了十多天,太桑心了。 It's perfect but a little bit noise. Cost over 10 days for customs clearance.. :-(
customer_reviews.author: chicagle

customer_reviews.title: Heat Pump in a Projector
customer_reviews.text: Returned it for I had planned to install in our bedroom. The heat that he projector puts out I needed a dedicated AC to keep the room cool. It maybe nice in the winter for heating your home, but for the summer months????
customer_reviews.author: Nitro7131

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great, it is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lee Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Broke down with in two month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on July 16th, today is August 24th and it no longer works. Switching it on nothing happens & it won't even respond to power off button. Now I'm stuck with broken item that I can no longer return. I would not recommend this projector anyone
customer_reviews.author: Irakli Gozalishvili

customer_reviews.title: love the epson 2030
customer_reviews.text: The Epson 2030 is great projector for the money. It is my second projector and looks great. At 14feet from wall i have a very pretty 115 inch screen. I ran Avatar bluray on my PS3 and the picture is like a movie theater. Brightness is not a issue and first thing I had to do was turn down the brightness tho I do have a darker livingroom than most. I have not used the 3d yet but did pair with my android devices easily. If you are looking for a great living room projector I would recommend. Projectorcentral dot com has a great and very accurate professional review
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Projector only worked for three hours
customer_reviews.text: Worked for three hours. Bulb went. Epson is sending me a new bulb which is nice but a new product should work out of the box. Will update assuming the bulb really is the issue.
customer_reviews.author: David Baglien

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like having customers for movie night and the weakest link ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. Replaced dvd players for intermittent problems. I have a showroom theater that cost more than most houses. This thing keeps failing. Nothing like having customers for movie night and the weakest link crap out again.
customer_reviews.author: hotrodoffroad

product_meta.title: Epson Home Cinema 2030 1080p, HDMI, 3LCD, Real 3D, 2000 Lumens Color and White Brightness, Home Theater Projector
product_meta.description: Discover bright cinematic adventures at home with the Home Cinema 2030. Enjoy Full HD 1080p performance practically anywhere, in 2D or 3D. Images are always rich and brilliant with 2000 lumens of color brightness and 2000 lumens of white brightness 2. Cheer on your favorite team with images up to 300" on any wall or screen. Use the built-in sound or your own speakers. Setup is easy. The Home Cinema 2030 comes with two HDMI ports. And, MHL connectivity turns your projector into a smart display, providing instant access to movies, videos and games from MHL-enabled smartphones and tablets.
feature_bullets: Up to 3x Brighter Colors with Epson
Full HD 1080p; up to 300" on any wall or screen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars178 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
